channel.title: Speculative on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Speculative on mattischrome

item.title: Out There Somewhere
item.description: Hurrah for more exoplanets making the news this week. This time it is a star with a whole bunch of small planets very close to the star, usually they tend to be single gas giants larger even than Jupiter as this list of stars with exoplanets from Wikipedia shows. But these stars are all so far away! The closest star with an exoplanet found in orbit around it so far is 10 light years away (Epsilon Eridani) and this weekâ€™s system was found over 2000 light years away.
